name: terrible road
description:
If you're a driver and you have driven on a terrible road, then you know the rules of this game- you have to avoid road holes and drive as far as you can before your car breaks down.
For extreme driving fans there is a traffic mode where you have to avoid not only road holes but also other drivers who are also trying to avoid road holes.
Also there is levels mode, will you be able to drive through the whole terrible road?
